name: Cake Blast
description:
Cake Blast is built for match 3 game lovers to start a cake exploration adventure. Try to create explosive combos via group at least 4 same cakes in a row to get the magical boosters. Collect breads and cakes for the preparation of tricky levels. Join the cool cake game to become the cake champion of sweet matching world!

Features:
- Hundreds of tasty cake filled levels with more added frequently
- 6 different lands in this cake world: Seaside Bakery, Donut Corridor, Paris Cuisine, Donuts Boutique, Pudding Shop, Nuts Bakery
- Uniquely interesting obstacles like ice floor, fluffy ball, cookie, candy bar, etc.
- Create amazing power-ups to clear the screen
- Wonderful animation explosive effects
- Explore the new world of incredible flavors
- Support for all types of Android devices
- Completely free to play

Travel and blast in this cake world, enjoy Cake Blast with sweet cake boost!
